entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Malay Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:58 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 20 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
